girl.floating_priestess: 1girl, floating above a glowing magic circle in the sky, long hair suspended, serene expression, robes billowing unnaturally
girl.mirror_girl: 1girl, emerging from a broken mirror surface, half-transparent body, expressionless gaze, surreal lighting
girl.gravity_defying: 1girl, upside down in midair, skirt flowing upward, relaxed expression, impossible posture
girl.fragmented_entity: 1girl, body partially pixelated or fractured, glitch effects, neon fragments hovering
girl.dream_swimmer: 1girl, swimming through air as if underwater, surrounded by glowing jellyfish, deep calm expression

scenery.inverted_city: cityscape floating upside down above a normal one, dual lighting, gravity conflict, surreal vibe
scenery.fractured_horizon: landscape splitting at the horizon, mismatched lighting directions, chaotic geometry
scenery.sky_tunnel: cylindrical sky with clouds spiraling inward, horizon curve visible, dreamlike
scenery.lava_rain: molten rain falling from calm clouds, reflective glass ground, red glow atmosphere
scenery.space_garden: garden in outer space, floating stones and glowing trees, planets visible in sky

animal.glitch_cat: cat-like creature with glitching outlines, neon eyes, levitating slightly, pixel tail trailing
animal.glass_fox: transparent fox with liquid core, refracting light, walking on water
animal.dragon_flower: floral-scaled dragon, petal wings, breathing glowing pollen
animal.clock_rabbit: rabbit with gears and clock face, antique texture, walking upright
animal.shadow_bird: bird made of living shadow, shifting edges, red pupils, silent presence

pair.time_split_twins: two girls facing away from each other, one bathed in sunset, one in moonlight, mirror symmetry
pair.angel_and_void: bright-winged girl standing next to a pitch-black silhouette, no facial features, tension in posture
pair.glitch_conversation: two figures mid-dialogue, one dissolving into data, the other sketch-like lines
pair.reflected_pairs: two pairs interacting across an invisible mirror plane, inverted poses and expressions
pair.gravity_dancers: two dancers midair, one upright, one upside down, in perfect mirrored pose
